pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or greater.
  • Processor: 500 MHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 150 MB available space

short_description: The full, uncensored soundtrack for Drumpf 2: Lost, But Not Forgotten!
